pages.title: Flapshell Turtle
pages.text: The Indian flapshell turtle ($(o)Lissemys punctata$()) is a freshwater species of turtle found in South Asia.$(br2)The "flap-shelled" name stems from the presence of femoral flaps located on the plastron.$(br2)These flaps of skin cover the limbs when they retract into the shell.

pages.title: Flapshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
